text: Josefina Echánove (September 29, 1927 – December 29, 2020) was a Mexican actress, model and journalist.Murió a los 93 años la actriz Josefina Echánove, madre de María del Sol She was nominated for two Ariel Award nominations. Echánove was known for her movies roles on El hombre de los hongos (1976), Amityville 3-D (1983), Gringo Viejo (1989), Cabeza de Vaca (1991) and Perdita Durango (1997). She also appeared in many telenovelas. Echánove died on December 29, 2020 in Mexico City at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1920s births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican models Category:Mexican journalists
title: Josefina Echánove
